info.description:
Xerces2 is a high performance, fully compliant XML parsers in the Apache Xerces family.
Xerces seems to have a dependency on xml apis, but it's difficult to know exactly on which version, cause xml apis seems to be themselves a bundle of several xml apis, each having their own revisions. For the moment, this dependency is not described in this ivy file, and should thus be expressed in your ivy file if you depend on xerces.
